TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoginViewDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 在視覺化設計工具中，為 Web 伺服器控制項提供設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項呈現的其中一個它的範本，取決於是否在使用者登入主機網站，並包含登入的使用者帳戶的角色。The control renders one of its templates, determined by whether a user is logged on to the host Web site, and the roles that contain the logged-on user account. 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換至 [設計] 檢視中，標記來源的程式碼，描述控制會經過剖析，而在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 當您切換回原始碼檢視時，以設計階段控制項保存到標記來源的程式碼並編輯網頁的標記。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 類別提供設計階段支援控制項。The class provides design-time support for the control. 屬性會傳回物件，其中通常包含物件衍生自繼承樹狀結構中的每個層級的設計工具中的類別。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. 屬性會傳回範本的相關聯的樣板群組集合控制項。The property returns a collection of template groups for the templates of the associated control. 屬性一律會傳回`true`，指出設計工具會建立相關聯的暫存複本控制項來產生設計階段標記。The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 類別方法提供下列功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法會傳回用來呈現相關聯的標記控制項在設計階段。The methods return the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time. 方法會取得在目前的範本時未定義的設計階段呈現關聯控制項的預留位置的標記。The method gets the markup that renders a placeholder for the associated control at design time when the current template is not defined. 方法提供在發生錯誤時的設計階段呈現關聯的控制項的標記。The method provides the markup that renders the associated control at design time when an error has occurred. - 方法會傳回目前的範本相關聯的序列化的複本控制項。The method returns a serialized copy of the current template for the associated control. 方法會從控制項樣板的序列化複本設定關聯控制項的區域。The method sets a region of the associated control from a serialized copy of a control template. - 方法準備設計工具，來檢視、 編輯和設計關聯控制項。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control. 至相關聯的控制項變更時，會呼叫方法。The method is called when there is a change to the associated control. 方法用來移除屬性，加入其他屬性，或遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。The method is used to remove properties from, add additional properties to, or shadow properties of the associated control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充若要變更的外觀和行為的控制項衍生自類別控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance and behavior of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 範例衍生`MyLoginView`控制項從。The example derives the `MyLoginView` control from the . `MyLoginView`是一份控制項。The `MyLoginView` is a copy of the control. 此範例也是衍生`MyLoginViewDesigner`類別從類別，並套用屬性`MyLoginViewDesigner`上`MyLoginView`控制項。The example also derives the `MyLoginViewDesigner` class from the class and applies a attribute for the `MyLoginViewDesigner` on the `MyLoginView` control. `MyLoginViewDesigner`控制項會覆寫下列成員：The `MyLoginViewDesigner` control overrides the following members: - 方法，讓屬性顯示在**屬性**在設計階段的方格。The method to make the property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time. - 方法來繪製控制項，使其範圍更明顯可見的橘色框線。The method to draw an orange border around the control to make its extent more visible. - 方法來產生標記的預留位置，其中包含錯誤訊息，這會呈現紅色，粗體文字。The method to generate the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message, which is rendered in red, bold text. - 方法來產生標記的預留位置，其中包含針對該控制項所定義的角色群組的名稱。The method to generate the markup for a placeholder that contains the names of the role groups that are defined for the control. - 方法會擲回例外狀況，如果相關聯的控制項不是`MyLoginView`物件。The method to throw an exception, if the associated control is not a `MyLoginView` object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體類別時，它會建立相關聯控制項或該控制項的設計介面上的複本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

summary.span: 取得在設計階段用來呈現關聯控制項的標記。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 字串，包含在設計階段用來呈現 的標記。

span.span: A string containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會設定相關聯的範本索引控制重新建立至目前的設計階段索引，然後會導致相關聯之的控制項和繫結它的子控制項，如有必要的資料。The method sets the template index of the associated control to the current design-time index, and then causes the associated control to recreate and data bind its child controls, if necessary. 下一步呼叫基底來產生標記的方法。Next, the calls the base method to generate the markup. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的類別，繼承自類別變成衍生自控制項的外觀在設計階段的類別。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 範例會繪製，使其範圍更明顯可見的控制項周圍橘色框線。The example draws an orange border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 如果您覆寫方法時，務必呼叫基底方法，因為它最後透過數個覆寫層級上呼叫控制項或控制項，來產生標記的複本。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

returns.span: 字串，包含在設計階段用來呈現 的標記。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立物件樣板編輯區視覺化設計工具介面，然後再初始化它做為範本。The method creates an object for a template editing area on the visual designer surface, and then initializes it as a template. 如果未不定義任何範本，會顯示字串，會提示您按一下以開始編輯。If no templates are defined, a string is displayed that prompts you to click to begin editing. 預先定義的常數用來產生傳回的標記。A predefined constant is used to generate the returned markup. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的類別，繼承自類別變成衍生自控制項的外觀在設計階段的類別。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 範例會繪製，使其範圍更明顯可見的控制項周圍橘色框線。The example draws an orange border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 這多載不會呼叫其基底方法或來產生標記的控制項。

span.span: This overload does not call on its base method or the control to generate the markup.

summary.span: 傳回於設計階段用來呈現關聯控制項之目前範本的序列化複本。

span.span: Returns a serialized copy of the current template that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 字串，包含於設計階段用來呈現關聯的 之範本的序列化複本。

span.span: A string containing a serialized copy of the template used to render the associated at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果範本實作介面可從此`region`參數，方法會傳回保存之樣板。If a template implementing the interface can be obtained from the `region` parameter, the method returns the persisted template. 否則，它會呼叫基底方法，來產生內容。Otherwise, it calls the base method to generate the content. 可還原序列化的樣板控制項使用方法。The serialized template can be restored to the control by using the method.

Protected Overrides Function GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml () As String

returns.span: 字串，包含在設計介面上呈現給替代符號的標記文字。

span.span: A string containing markup text that renders to a placeholder on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會先格式化字串訊息，指定目前範本的相關聯的名稱控制項，並也會指定是空的範本。The method first formats a string message that specifies the name of the current template of the associated control and also specifies that the template is empty. 則產生標記的預留位置，其中包含該訊息。Then the generates the markup for a placeholder containing that message. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的類別，繼承自類別變成衍生自控制項的外觀在設計階段的類別。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 這個範例會產生包含所有名稱的預留位置標記關聯控制項定義的物件。The example generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the names of all the objects that are defined for the associated control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#5)]

returns.span: 包含標記的字串，此標記可用來在設計階段發生錯誤之後呈現關聯的 。

span.span: A string that contains the markup used to render the associated at design time after an error has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 錯誤設計階段控制項呈現為面板，其中包含的型別名稱、 控制項名稱和宣布，及描述錯誤的訊息。The error design-time control renders as a panel that contains the type name, the control name, and messages announcing and describing the error. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的類別，繼承自類別變成衍生自控制項的外觀在設計階段的類別。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 這個範例會產生一個預留位置，包括錯誤訊息，以紅色粗體文字呈現標記。The example generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message, which is rendered in red, bold text. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#2)]

summary.span: 準備設計工具，以檢視、編輯和設計關聯控制項。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計師會呼叫 visual方法時就準備好使用設計工具來呈現控制項。The visual designer calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 和其基底方法設定屬性，並設定設計工具的運作所需的事件。The and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`參數是與這個設計工具或一份相關聯的控制項控制項。The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的類別，繼承自類別來衍生自控制項的行為變更類別在設計階段。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the behavior of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 此範例會擲回，如果關聯的控制項不`MyLoginView`物件。The example throws an , if the associated control is not a `MyLoginView` object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#6)]

span.span: The source of the event.
A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 與這個設計工具關聯的控制項有變更時呼叫。

span.span: Called when there is a change to the control that is associated with this designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法時，會呼叫相關聯的事件控制項執行。The method is called when the event of the associated control executes. 一般而言，這是以回應在控制項上屬性變更時 (例如**屬性**方格變更)。Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change). 如果控制項樣板變更時，**屬性**重新整理方格。If the control template is changed, the **Properties** grid is refreshed. 確認目前的範本索引是否有效，而且接著會呼叫基底方法。The verifies that the current template index is valid, and then calls the base method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 實作 的新加入或遮蔽的屬性所成之集合。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added or shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供設計工具使用，以便在 [屬性] 方格的顯示中移除屬性或新增屬性，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項設計工具使用的方法，衍生自陰影對應的設計階段屬性設計工具實作，使用的各種控制項屬性，以將屬性新增至或從其中移除屬性的方法**屬性**方格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 方法會套用屬性屬性，就不會出現在**屬性**方格。The method applies the attribute of the property so that it does not appear in the **Properties** grid. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的類別，繼承自類別，以變更**屬性**方格控制項衍生自類別在設計時間。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the **Properties** grid of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 範例會使屬性顯示在**屬性**方格。The example makes the property visible in the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#3)]

para.span: 覆寫方法，以將屬性新增至移除屬性，或變更設計階段屬性集合中屬性的屬性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to, remove properties from, or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理程序。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(class System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (region As EditableDesignerRegion, content As String)
public: override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(System::Web::UI::Design::EditableDesignerRegion ^ region, System::String ^ content);

span.span: An that provides the name of the region to update.

param.name: content
param.span: 包含關聯控制項序列化樣板的字串。

span.span: A string that contains a serialized template for the associated control.

summary.span: 從控制項樣板的序列化複本，設定關聯控制項的區域。

span.span: Sets a region of the associated control from a serialized copy of a control template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會剖析相關聯的序列化的樣板所指定的控制項`content`參數，然後更新所指定之控制項的區域中使用範本屬性`region`參數。The method parses a serialized template for the associated control that is specified by the `content` parameter, and then uses the template to update the region of the control that is specified by the property of the `region` parameter. 目前的範本控制項可以使用序列化方法。The current template of the control can be serialized using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection

summary.span: 針對關聯控制項的欄位，取得範本群組的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.

value.span: ，包含 控制項中每個範本的項目。

span.span: A containing an element for each template in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得物件基底屬性，並將物件都包含單一匿名範本 （其對應至任何使用者登入），物件的登入的範本，並針對每個中的項目相關聯的集合控制權傳輸至。The property gets a object from the base property, and then adds objects that contain a single object for the anonymous template (which corresponds to no user logged on), for the logged-on template, and for each element in the collection of the associated control to the . 傳回此給呼叫者。The returns this to the caller.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出設計工具是否應該使用暫存複本，而非與設計工具關聯的實際控制項，來產生設計階段標記。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為屬性一律會是`true`，在設計工具屬性會傳回一份相關聯的控制項來產生設計階段標記。Because the property is always `true`, the designer property returns a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 屬性，建立複本所保存的實際控制項，則剖析的永續性的控制項字串。The property creates the copy by persisting the actual control, then parsing the persisted control string. 複製的控制項不會影響任何的持續性的實際。The copied control does not affect any persistence for the actual . 如果已覆寫屬性來傳回`false`，設計工具會使用相關聯控制項本身產生設計階段標記，以及控制項的設計階段變更會保存至網頁的標記來源。If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated control itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.

para.span: 您可以覆寫屬性來傳回或者判斷其中的控制項是否標示為類別層級值屬性。

span.span: You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class level attribute.
If the is not overridden, the ignores the .
